attributes.action: address the recent increase in teenage suicides
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Isn't it a tragic inditement on our society that so many young people feel they have so little hope that they need to take thier own lives ? The petitioner is urging the P.M. to examine this dangerous trend, the proliferation of suicide - assisting web pages and support strategies, in accordance with the NHS Plan to recognise "at risk" cases and act more promptly and preventatively before any more wasted talent and opportunity is lost amongst our young people.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
